languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, разрешите доложить". {n}Мастер вокса почтительно взирает на вас.{/n} "Ваши премудрые {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}лексмеханики{/g} проанализировали состояние протектората. Они считают, что, благодаря вашим решительным действиям, острая фаза кризиса миновала. Владениям династии фон Валанциус больше не грозят распад и гибель".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, разрешите доложить". {n}Мастер Вокса почтительно взирает на вас.{/n} "Ваши премудрые лексмеханики проанализировали состояние торговой империи. Они считают, что, благодаря вашим решительным действиям, острая фаза кризиса миновала. Владениям дома фон Валанциус больше не грозят распад и гибель".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, permission to report!" {n}the Vox Master says, looking at you deferentially.{/n} "Your wise {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} have analysed the state of the protectorate. They believe that, thanks to your decisive actions, the acute phase of the crisis has passed. The domain of the von Valancius dynasty is no longer facing dissolution and ruin."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, разрешите доложить". {n}Мастер вокса почтительно взирает на вас.{/n} "Ваши премудрые {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}лексмеханики{/g} проанализировали состояние протектората. Они считают, что, благодаря вашим решительным действиям, острая фаза кризиса миновала. Владениям династии фон Валанциус больше не грозят распад и гибель".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report!" {n}Vigdis is looking at you with respect.{/n} "Your wise Lexmechanics have analyzed the state of the trade empire. They believe that, thanks to your decisive actions, the acute phase of the crisis has passed. The realm of the von Valancius dynasty is no longer facing dissolution and ruin."

They believe that, thanks to your decisive actions, the acute phase of the crisis has passed. The realm of the von Valancius dynasty is no longer facing dissolution and ruin."

They believe that, thanks to your decisive actions, the acute phase of the crisis has passed. The domain of the von Valancius dynasty is no longer facing dissolution and ruin."

They believe that, thanks to your decisive actions, the acute phase of the crisis has passed. The domain of the von Valancius dynasty is no longer facing dissolution and ruin."

"Lord Captain, permission to report!" {n}the Vox Master says, looking at you deferentially.{/n} "Your wise {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} have analysed the state of the protectorate. They believe that, thanks to your decisive actions, the acute phase of the crisis has passed. The domain of the von Valancius dynasty is no longer facing dissolution and ruin."

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ご報告いたします！」{n}ヴォクス・マスターは敬意のこもったまなざしであなたを見つめて話す。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン所属の学識豊かな{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法技術者{/g}が、保護領の状態を分析しています。保護領ではロード・キャプテンの断行のおかげで危機的な重大局面を乗り切ったと信じられています。フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の領地が崩壊や破滅を迎えることはもはやありません」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report!" {n}the Vox Master says, looking at you deferentially.{/n} "Your wise {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} have analysed the state of the protectorate. They believe that, thanks to your decisive actions, the acute phase of the crisis has passed. The domain of the von Valancius dynasty is no longer facing dissolution and ruin."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ご報告いたします！」{n}ヴォクス・マスターは敬意のこもったまなざしであなたを見つめて話す。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン所属の学識豊かな{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法技術者{/g}が、保護領の状態を分析しています。保護領ではロード・キャプテンの断行のおかげで危機的な重大局面を乗り切ったと信じられています。フォン・ヴァランシウス朝の領地が崩壊や破滅を迎えることはもはやありません」

languages.text: “舰长大人，请求汇报！”{n}音阵大师毕恭毕敬地看着你。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}思律机僧{/g}已经对王朝的状况进行了全面评估。他们认为，由于您采取了果断的行动，最危急的阶段已经过去。如今，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝已不再面临分崩离析的风险。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report!" {n}the Vox Master says, looking at you deferentially.{/n} "Your wise {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} have analysed the state of the protectorate. They believe that, thanks to your decisive actions, the acute phase of the crisis has passed. The domain of the von Valancius dynasty is no longer facing dissolution and ruin."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，请求汇报！”{n}音阵大师毕恭毕敬地看着你。{/n}“{g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}法律技工{/g}已经对王朝的状况进行了全面评估。他们认为，由于您采取了果断的行动，最危急的阶段已经过去。如今，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝已不再面临分崩离析的风险。”

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán, tengo un informe que presentar!». {n}La maestra de vocos te mira con deferencia.{/n} «Sus sabios {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmecánicos{/g} han analizado el estado del protectorado. Gracias a su acción decisiva, creen que lo peor de la crisis ya ha pasado. El dominio de la dinastía von Valancius ya no se encuentra al borde del abismo y de la ruina».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report!" {n}the Vox Master says, looking at you deferentially.{/n} "Your wise {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} have analysed the state of the protectorate. They believe that, thanks to your decisive actions, the acute phase of the crisis has passed. The domain of the von Valancius dynasty is no longer facing dissolution and ruin."

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán, tengo un informe que presentar!». {n}La maestra de vocos te mira con deferencia.{/n} «Sus sabios {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmecánicos{/g} han analizado el estado del protectorado. Gracias a su acción decisiva, creen que lo peor de la crisis ya ha pasado. El dominio de la dinastía von Valancius ya no se encuentra al borde del abismo y de la ruina».

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, permission de faire mon rapport ! {n}s'exclame la maîtresse-vox avec déférence.{/n} Vos sages {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmécaniciens{/g} ont analysé l'état du protectorat. D'après eux, grâce à vos actions décisives, le pire de la crise est passé. Le domaine de la dynastie von Valancius est sorti d'affaire et n'a plus à craindre d'être dissolu. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report!" {n}the Vox Master says, looking at you deferentially.{/n} "Your wise {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} have analysed the state of the protectorate. They believe that, thanks to your decisive actions, the acute phase of the crisis has passed. The domain of the von Valancius dynasty is no longer facing dissolution and ruin."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, permission de faire mon rapport ! {n}s'exclame la maîtresse-vox avec déférence.{/n} Vos sages {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}lexmécaniciens{/g} ont analysé l'état du protectorat. D'après eux, grâce à vos actions décisives, le pire de la crise est passé. Le domaine de la dynastie von Valancius est sorti d'affaire et n'a plus à craindre d'être dissolu. »

languages.text: "Lord Captain, bitte um Erlaubnis für Bericht!", {n}sagt die Voxmeisterin und sieht dich respektvoll an.{/n} "Eure weisen {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanici{/g} haben die Lage des Protektorats analysiert. Sie glauben, dass die akute Krisenphase dank Eures entschlossenen Eingreifens vorüber ist. Das Reich der Dynastie von Valancius steht nicht länger vor Auflösung und Ruin."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report!" {n}the Vox Master says, looking at you deferentially.{/n} "Your wise {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} have analysed the state of the protectorate. They believe that, thanks to your decisive actions, the acute phase of the crisis has passed. The domain of the von Valancius dynasty is no longer facing dissolution and ruin."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, bitte um Erlaubnis für Bericht!", {n}sagt die Voxmeisterin und sieht dich respektvoll an.{/n} "Eure weisen {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanici{/g} haben die Lage des Protektorats analysiert. Sie glauben, dass die akute Krisenphase dank Eures entschlossenen Eingreifens vorüber ist. Das Reich der Dynastie von Valancius steht nicht länger vor Auflösung und Ruin."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, müsaadenizle raporumu arz edeceğim!" {n}diyor Vox Üstadı sana hürmetle bakarak.{/n} "Bilge {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmekanikler{/g}, protektoranın durumunu analiz etti. Kararlı eylemleriniz sayesinde krizin akutluk aşamasının geçtiğine inanıyorlar. Von Valancius hanedanlığının hükümdarlığı, artık dağılma ve yıkımla karşı karşıya değil."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, permission to report!" {n}the Vox Master says, looking at you deferentially.{/n} "Your wise {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmechanics{/g} have analysed the state of the protectorate. They believe that, thanks to your decisive actions, the acute phase of the crisis has passed. The domain of the von Valancius dynasty is no longer facing dissolution and ruin."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan, müsaadenizle raporumu arz edeceğim!" {n}diyor Vox Üstadı sana hürmetle bakarak.{/n} "Bilge {g|Encyclopedia:Lexmechanic}Lexmekanikler{/g}, protektoranın durumunu analiz etti. Kararlı eylemleriniz sayesinde krizin akut aşamasının geçtiğine inanıyorlar. Von Valancius hükümdarlığı artık dağılma ve yıkımla karşı karşıya değil."
